channel.title: Digital Preservation on IT for archivists
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Preservation on IT for archivists

item.title: siegfried
item.description: Siegfried Siegfried is a signature-based file format identification tool. It implements: - the National Archives UK’s PRONOM file format signatures - freedesktop.org’s MIME-info file format signatures - the Library of Congress’s FDD file format signatures (beta). Install Windows download latest (v. {{.Version}}) binary: (64bit | 32bit) copy to a location in your system path run the sf -update command to download the latest signatures (got troubles? Try this troubleshooting guide) Mac Homebrew (or Linuxbrew) brew install mistydemeo/digipres/siegfried
